channel.title: If you have enough time Please Answer
channel.description:
I have been trying to solve this all today and yesterday
K so heres the problem
I have my Variables set
PATH - [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin[/code] CLASSPATH - [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
this is whats in my .bat
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
I have no idea whats wrong. [center][b]Additional Information Windows 7 64bit Jdk1u18 [/b][/center]
I get this when i compile [b]System Cannot find path blah blah Finished! (doesnt compile) Any key to continue[/b]

item.description:
@damien_b wrote:

I have been trying to solve this all today and yesterday

K so heres the problem

I have my Variables set

PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin
CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

this is whats in my .bat

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

I have no idea whats wrong.
[center]Additional Information

[/center]

System Cannot find path blah blah
Finished! (doesnt compile)
Any key to continue
